verse_content.Sanskrit:
किरीटिनं गदिनं चक्रिणं च
तेजोराशिं सर्वतो दीप्तिमन्तम् ।
पश्यामि त्वां दुर्निरीक्ष्यं समन्ता-
द्दीप्तानलार्कद्युतिमप्रमेयम् ॥ १७ ॥
verse_content.Transliteration:
kirītinam gadinam cakriņam ca
tejo-rāśim sarvato dīptimantam
paśyāmi tvām durnirīkṣyaṁ samantād
dīptānalārka-dyutim aprameyam
verse_content.Translation:
Your form, adorned with various crowns, clubs and discs, is difficult to see
because of its glaring effulgence, which is fiery and immeasurable like the sun.
